website_summaries.verdict: Consider this if comfort trumps functionality and you're not overly concerned with weatherproofing. This portable down sport blanket adds a touch of luxury to the outdoor experience.
pros: Comes with stuff sack for portability
Lightweight design won't weigh you down
cons: Won't keep you from getting wet

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: This down throw is wonderful since the other down throws I have bought were smaller in size. This is 50 X 70 and I use 2 on a queen sized bed in duvet covers with just a fitted sheet. The duvet covers are washed once a week. This way my husband and I do not have to share a cover. It is cool in the summer and I will see if it is warm enough in the winter. The quality is great!
customer_reviews.author: Effie DCTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Nice blanket, but no stuff sack
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed when the blanket arrived with no stuff sack for taking camping, but I'm glad I kept it (I ended up making a stuff sack) because it made all the difference when camping in 30 degree temps in Yellowstone. It's nice quality fabric, not too thick, very packable, and add significant warmth. It looks so nice I plan to use is on the couch during cold weather months. They need to take the stuff sack image off the page.
customer_reviews.author: gstx

customer_reviews.title: Quality, light weight warmth and wonderful fabric to touch
customer_reviews.text: Have been looking for a few years to replace one I found almost 18 yrs ago and couldn’t believe it was not commonly available. Delighted to have stumbled upon it here and am thrilled with the product. My 85 yo mom loved it even more while visiting recently as she’s from the gulf coast area of the country and I’m in the pacific nw region. Considering another purchase bc it is so nice.
customer_reviews.author: jct in Olywa

customer_reviews.title: warm to the touch
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it as a light cover for my bedding. I've been hugely surprised by how warm this seemingly modest down blanket is. in its price range you usually get 7 ounces of down, but this has 8 ounces, a good 15% more down, and it shows. very, very nice blanket with sewn sectors that keep the down evenly spread. i'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Hon Lee

customer_reviews.title: A great throw cover
customer_reviews.text: Based on other reviews the first thing I did was launder it and it came out with noticeably greater loft than when it was received. I use the cover while sleeping in my recliner (to which medical issues confine me at night) and the house heat is set to 63 degrees. The cover keeps me warm at that temp but if it gets much colder, I need more covering than just the throw. It's a great size, covering me well yet very easy to fold and store the next morning.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: Just what I had hoped for
customer_reviews.text: It is a great throw. I take it everywhere-- when I travel, when sitting on the couch reading and to bed for sleeping. TThe only downside is that there aren't more colors to choose from. I would love to see a few more colors (lighter, neutral colors or something) so that I could buy more and put them all over the house! I have only washed twice and it came out perfect (dried with tennis balls).
customer_reviews.author: avril

customer_reviews.title: The color is a beautiful dark red
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 5 of the red. The color is a beautiful dark red, not the bright red pictured. The size is perfect for our theater chairs. After washing on delicate and throwing in the dryer on ultra delicate with 2 tennis balls, all came out perfectly. (The bad review probably put it through a regular cycle, better to go delicate to protect your investment). The size is a 70" which is 10 inches longer than the majority of throws. They Keep your warm and comfy, as promised and are very lightweight on the body, Perfect napping coverlet. I would recommend highly and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: BEE

customer_reviews.title: Camping Staple for our Family!
customer_reviews.text: Used this for camping with a large family and was perfect for when I couldn't get close enough to the fire. Added just the right amount of heat on top of my hoodie, or sometimes I'd fold it up on top of my camp chair to keep my butt from freezing while sitting next to the fire. We also used it for extra warmth during the night one extra chilly night, and on a warm night I used it for my upper body instead of my mummy bag just because it's a more pleasant weight and texture. This will definitely be a staple for all family camping trips going forward. Thinking of getting another one!
customer_reviews.author: Clarichatts

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this product.
customer_reviews.text: Both of the down throws that I received from this manufacturer contained "morgellons-like" fibers upon close examination with a hand-held microscope. Why did I examine this product in this way? Because I had heard that some China-made products have these fibers on them. I did not know this item was made in China at the time of purchase but upon unpacking the throw blankets, I saw that they were made in China. So, I inspected them and alas I found long fibers that are "nano-tech" fibers and these fibers are not a natural part of the fabric. They are associated with Morgellons Disease. So, I will be throwing these "throws" into the trash. What a loss. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Joan G. Esnayra

customer_reviews.title: Nice and snuggly for cool weather naps.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and puffiness for our mild winter weather in the South. Nice quality throw. The throw held up nicely when washed in my Samsung washing machine and dried in my drier.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl L. Boswell

customer_reviews.title: Soft, Blanket, Warm Blanket, Little pile of Goose Down
customer_reviews.text: This lightweight down throw is large enough to become my nightly blanket all year long, although I usually add another in winter. Although I'm wary of petrochemical products, the microfiber cover is enticingly comfortable against my skin. Since I sleep on an under-filled waterbed with a feather-filled mattress topper, experience has taught me that no waterbed sheets work, staying successfully tucked in, even with the best under-mattress locking devices, so I 'make my bed' with multiple quilts, to protect from misplaced cat claws. This blanky is my new fave and it's blue!
customer_reviews.author: MadWriter

customer_reviews.title: Best best best down...great individual size and cleans up well.
customer_reviews.text: Had these for a bit now- multiple trips to the washer and dryer. Always comes out in good shape and I now fight the dogs for it. May have to buy a 2nd.
customer_reviews.author: Katie C

customer_reviews.title: absolutely wonderful! i've been looking for a good down throw ...
customer_reviews.text: absolutely wonderful! i've been looking for a good down throw for a long time, i just ordered another one. it is warm, and big and beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel throw for winter RVing.
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. Nice stitching and light-weight. I fluffed it in the dryer with a couple of laundry balls, now perfect!
customer_reviews.author: TSM

customer_reviews.title: Nice throw for the price
customer_reviews.text: I really like this down comforter. Its the perfect weight for me. I have to have a blanket on me whenever Im sitting watching tv and I am cold natured. This throw is perfect. Not to heavy and not to light. Easy to tale care of. The only complaint that I have is that some of the feathers are starting to come out. Its not too bad but is noticeable. It sort of juts looks like a little lint not large feathers. Other than that I love this throw and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: nice quality
customer_reviews.text: bought this as added lightweight warmth for camping. Extremely happy with purchase. Kept me warm around campfire in low 40 degree temps and added warmth in my tent. I did not baby this, used it at my campsite, my dog used it, got dirty etc but machine washed wonderfully!!! No feathers poking out, soft, fluffy, warm. After normal washing and dryer it looked brand new. All the campsite dirt-gone. No feathers poking out. Will most likely purchase an additional one. Throw size is perfect for couch and on bed as an add on blanket.

customer_reviews.title: smells like death..do not get wet....

customer_reviews.title: Gift receiver loved it.
customer_reviews.text: It was thinner than I thought it would be. My fellow took it out of the box and grinned so big...put it across his body and said...it's warm....He wears it around his shoulders when sitting at the computer and lays under it watching television in his recliner...He has used it every single day since he opened it...so YES I AM HAPPY with this product....more importantly to me...My fellow is happy with this product.

customer_reviews.title: Soooo disappointed

But for the above reasons, we will not be using this blanket. Waste of money.

customer_reviews.title: Not a soft, cozy blanket. Seller offered refund
customer_reviews.text: The down aspect is good. I’d prefer a softer more flexible covering though. Addendum: a few weeks after this review I was contacted by the company who offers a full refund. That’s good service. The blanket, however did not change.

customer_reviews.title: very light-LOVE it!!!

customer_reviews.title: Warm but lightweight

customer_reviews.title: This item is comfy cozy.

If anyone’s looking for a mini comforter look no further this item is the perfect thing for you. I hope this information helps and was informative.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome blanket

customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Throw
customer_reviews.text: I like this throw, for its lightweighness and warmth. It fluffed up nicely after washing/drying on receipt. I’m going to wash it again, and use an essential oil on the wool balls in the dryer - there is a noticeable bit of an odd odor to the cleaned throw (smells like wet dog) which I want to try to get rid of.

customer_reviews.title: Federdecke/Feather Blanket

It's not heavy or thick so you can use it any time of year. I come from a German background. In German we call this a federdecke. Although the blanket wasn't as large as I had imagined it to be, it reminds me of Germany every night I go to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Blackmoon

customer_reviews.title: Nice. warm. light weight. no bulk.
customer_reviews.text: I plan on using this when I travel and need to bring my own bedding. I wish it had a cloth travel sack to hold it while in transit instead of being packed in a plastic bag but I suppose I can just use a grosgrain ribbon to secure it in my luggage if I decide to ditch the plastic sac it came in.

customer_reviews.title: Great warm blanket

customer_reviews.title: Oh Down!

customer_reviews.title: Length is perfect

Color:NavyThe Benefit of Using Down Blanket 


This blanket by puredown can be used both outdoor and indoor. It is the thing that you need when you go camping or stay on couch. You can feel the soft touch and warmth when you get a little cooler. Our down blanket is the ultimate travel partner that fits in any small backpack or purse.


High Quality Stuffing 


Our down and feather are selected and disinfected strictly. With its high fluffiness and softness, our product can significantly improve users's sleeping quality. Users will feel less pressure on their body during sleeping


Storage Method


Many people store their blankets during off seasons. The key to storing your blanket is breathability. Letting the down breathe by keeping your blanket in a cloth bag will prevent any moisture or odor buildup. It should also be stored in a location where it is not compressed and has room to stay fluffy. Give your blanket a good shake when you take it out of the bag next season and it should be ready to go
